name: Iain Murray 0001
content: Iain Murray Iain Murray Professor of Machine Learning and Inference, ANC, School of Informatics, University of Edinburgh. Contact: i.murray@ed.ac.uk. Background/bio/interests. Currently highlighting: Density estimation: Maximum Likelihood Diffusions, Spline Flows, NADE. Inference: Sequential Neural Likelihood and Pseudo-Marginal Slice Sampling. Browser extension: redirect links to PDFs on arXiv et al. to the paper’s abstract page. An old cartoon sketch of some research interests. Main content: Group (PhD students) Publications Teaching, including video lectures on Machine Learning, MCMC Edinburgh Informatics roles: Personal Tutor, MLPR Machine Learning course, Project supervision. Code, Computer notes Information for prospective group members Other fun things: NeurIPS submission times; oranges and lemons; my brain; Juggling. My other webpages and useful links. Mastodon Accessibility—Iain Murray’s homepage, contact details
